title: Deleting UDR Fields mappings - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
text: In the ECS Inspector - Searchable Fields page, scroll to the Mapping section. Under the Actions column, click the ellipsis button () and select Delete . A dialog will appear requesting you to confirm your decision. Click the Delete button to delete the UDR Field Mapping. Note! You cannot select individual UDR Field mappings for deletion. When a mapping is deleted, all UDR Field mappings under that UDR Type will be removed. Warning! A deleted UDR Field mapping cannot be recovered.
